function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Restrictions on exportation of ppes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on imports and donations for critical healthcare equipment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of airfreighting due to high demand for n95 masks","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"National interests and protectionism as a by-product of covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Consumer behavior change leading to panic buying of essential goods","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited production capacity of ppe facemasks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of recession on r&d","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Patenting of medical equipment leading to scarcity","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to travel restrictions and border closures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of global supply chains to disease-related disruptions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stress on healthcare systems and risk of food insecurity due to lockdowns and border restrictions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continued reporting of new cases of covid-19 in different parts of the globe","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socio-economic impact of covid-19 leading to a global recession","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Projection of $9 trillion cumulative gdp loss due to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduced chinese imports leading to global economic downturn","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restrictions in mobility and aviation activities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited avenues to reduce costs for airports during traffic declines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High reduction in airplane seats and passenger traffic due to covid-19 impact","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in international passengers and airport revenues","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Revenue loss and drop in passenger kilometres for domestic and international routes","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 outbreak on aviation industry, leading to reduced annual rpks and revenues","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on environmentally sustainable models due to reduced carbon/greenhouse gas emissions during the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 through international travel","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic impact on countries reliant on tourism","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Threat to sustainable development goals","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Globalization and sustained economic growth, as foundational assumptions of the sdgs, are hampered by covid-19, leading to slow progress.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reductions in air pollution due to covid-19-induced lockdowns and decreased industrial activities.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The high level of air pollution is linked to the spread and impact of respiratory diseases, coronary heart diseases, lung cancer, and asthma, making people more susceptible to the damaging effects of contagious diseases such as coronavirus.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Between 28,000 to 36,000 deaths per year in the uk are linked to long-term exposure to air pollutants, further increasing the impact of air pollution on public health and wellbeing.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in environmental noise over the lockdown period has been reported to have saved more lives than those already caused by covid-19 in china, indicating the significant impact of environmental factors on public health.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental noise pollution impacting health and well-being","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of noise on exercise rates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on coal and oil demand","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decline in global electricity demand during lockdown","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented reduction in global co2 emissions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of online platforms lead to a decrease in transportation-related pollution levels.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased online orders for food may lead to over-reliance on delivery services and economy structure effect on emissions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emissions intensity effect on emissions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global economic activities driving up co2 emissions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effects of economic recessions on emissions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unpredictable changes in trajectory due to social trauma of lockdown and behavioral fragility","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social inequality and inherent brittleness in the current economic system","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
